Well, Rosemary claims it's because of the "imprinting" of energy on the bo=
x.  I guess just use will re-imprint it. 
 
 I have concerns about the olde=
r boxes that I now consider junk. I feel sorry for the ones that have those=
, and are forced to use it because nothing else is available. There's no ni=
ce way to say it, the old boxes are just shitty! I wish I could replace tho=
se, but it's not like I have factory and can just whip out some new boxes. =

 
 
 Frank


To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comFrom: paranormalinvestigating@hotm=
ail.comDate: Thu, 27 Sep 2007 10:11:52 -0400Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] here are=
 some captures from box #12 session 2




Frank R, That is another possible=
 theory, It is going to take a lot of experimentation to find the true answ=
ers.And we may never do that. The incident that led me to that hypothesis w=
as the first and second sessions with the box they continually asked for fr=
ank and purple even after I stated my name as the user of the box and it's =
new location. Steve also had a similar occurrence with box thirteen asking =
about Colorado and purple when he first received his box. I will try to get=
 some answers on the subject from our friends on the other side until then =
your guess is as good as mine. Bruce

Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigati=
ng Team 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: warrior18eii@...: Thu=
, 27 Sep 2007 06:34:41 -0700Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] here are some captures f=
rom box #12 session 2




Bruce,It has nothing to do with the box. The box =
is just a tool to make the physical connection by making their voices audib=
le. It is your spiritual connection to the group of spirits around you and =
the spirits around Frank that makes the communication possible. Frank's "gu=
ys" have just become aware of you thats all. The box don't have a signature=
 or its own aura or give off a certain vibration or whatever you want to ca=
ll it. It is a group of circuits that are manipulated or operated by spirit=
s. Everyday before you had a box you still communicated with the spirit gro=
up around you. Even if only on a subconscious level through influence. With=
 the box you still use the same spiritual connection to communicate with th=
em and they are using a physical medium to communicate with you.Regards,Fra=
nk R.
----- Original Message ----From: bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@ho=
tmail.com>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comSent: Thursday, September 27, 2007 7:1=
7:29 AMSubject: [EVP-ITC] here are some captures from box #12 session 2

I =
believe that each box carries it's own signature and the spirits that commu=
nicate through that box know the individual box by the energy it gives off.=
 So they get used to a certain person that has been using that individual b=
ox and when the user changes they get somewhat confused about who is using =
the box. But I think they are getting used to me being the new user. my ses=
sions are becoming more and more responsive. I have posted some file from s=
ession #2 with the box, they are in the files section please let me know wh=
at you think.Bruce

Be a better Heartthrob. Get better relationship answers=
 from someone who knows.Yahoo! Answers - Check it out.

t generation of MSN Messenger  Get it now!
